about_the_game:
Once upon a time there was a world... Not our world, but, like, some a World Outhere. In this World Outhere, orcs, humans and elves lived in peace, without drama, without fights in the bank lines, you know? But peace doesn't last long, and to reaffirm this phrase, from the center of the planet, commander Maximus Taurus and his band of fanatical ruminants without a single better thing to do, rised and started to destroy everything!

At the center of it all, once upon a time there was Ulton Gograk, a chill orc who lived in peace with his love and his sandwich (yes, sandwich, after all, a loving and well-fed orc wants nothing more to continue this way) until the evil cows kidnapped his love, threw him in jail and worst of all, TOOK AWAY HIS FOOD! Armed with motivation, love and major hunger, Ulton suddenly becomes the greatest hope of the World Outhere to free everyone. With strength, courage and unique skills that only an empty stomach make you have, he will undergo on an epic journey to defeat Commander Maximus and take back everything that was taken from him.

Travel through hand-crafted scenarios pixel by pixel, overcome obstacles, face lots of idle cattle and watch out for traps! Be THE MAN (actually the orc), git gud and KICK THE HELL OUT OF THE BOSSES! Your unique journey will take you to impressive environments, from the calm countryside without pollution, horn noise and a working icecream machine to futuristic cities and floating islands in the sky, still without a single working icecream machine (those things never work, for God's sake)...

Get ready to have fun and help Ulton. Save this World Outhere, save your Love and save your sandwich!

name: Ulton's Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: In Ulton’s Quest, evil cows from the center of the planet have kidnapped your beloved one, put you in jail and took away your food! An adventure based on technology, love and the POWER OF ANGRYNESS! Save the planet, save your love and save your sandwich!
